name: app
description: One Complete SRE and DevOps platform.

scripts.uninstall: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
scripts.delete-all-local-branches: git branch | grep -v 'master' | xargs git branch -D
scripts.start-enterprise-dev: export DOCKER_CLIENT_TIMEOUT=1000 && export COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=1000 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d $npm_config_services
scripts.remove-all-containers: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) || echo 'No running containers'
scripts.docker-enterprise-test: npm install && npm run remove-all-containers && docker-compose build && docker-compose --env-file=./docker-compose-enterprise-ci.env up -d && cd tests && npm run-script enterprise-test
scripts.docker-saas-test: npm install && npm run remove-all-containers && docker-compose build && docker-compose --env-file=./docker-compose-saas-ci.env up -d && cd tests && npm run-script saas-test
scripts.ci-docker-enterprise: export NODE_ENV=ci && npm run remove-all-containers && docker-compose build && docker-compose --env-file=./docker-compose-enterprise-ci.env up -d
scripts.ci-docker-saas: export NODE_ENV=ci && npm run remove-all-containers && docker-compose build && docker-compose --env-file=./docker-compose-saas-ci.env up -d
scripts.ci-docker-saas-init-script: export NODE_ENV=ci && npm run remove-all-containers && docker-compose build init-script && docker compose --env-file=./docker-compose-saas-ci.env up -d init-script
scripts.ci-docker-enterprise-init-script: export NODE_ENV=ci && npm run remove-all-containers && docker-compose build init-script && docker compose --env-file=./docker-compose-enterprise-ci.env up -d init-script
